name: Chef's Salad
description: A classic American salad featuring romaine lettuce, diced turkey and ham, hard-boiled egg, cheese, tomatoes, avocado, and other vegetables, served with a simple vinaigrette.
instructions: Prepare the Dressing: In a small bowl or jar, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, mustard, honey, and garlic powder. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.
Prepare Salad Base: In a large bowl or on a plate, create a bed of chopped romaine lettuce. Top with shredded carrots and thinly sliced red onion.
Arrange Toppings: Artfully arrange the diced turkey, diced ham, quartered hard-boiled egg, halved cherry tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese, and diced avocado over the lettuce base.
Add Seeds & Seasoning: Sprinkle the sunflower or pumpkin seeds over the salad. Season lightly with salt and pepper if desired.
Serve: Drizzle the prepared vinaigrette dressing over the salad just before serving.
cookNotes: Ensure all ingredients are cold for the best experience.
Hard-boiled eggs, turkey, and ham can be prepared in advance.
Dice avocado just before serving to prevent browning.
Assemble salad just before serving to keep lettuce crisp. Dressing can be made ahead and stored separately.
